dcterms:description: The dataset is used for predicting traffic flow volume, direction, and speed on a high-resolution map of three large cities worldwide. The task involves predicting future traffic maps up to one hour later based on dynamic and static input data.
dcterms:title: Traffic4cast challenge 2020

dcterms:creator: David P. Kreil
et al.
dcterms:description: This dataset was used for predicting traffic flow volume, direction, and speed on a high-resolution map of three large cities worldwide, focusing on a similar task as the 2020 challenge but with different parameters.
dcterms:title: Traffic4cast 2019

dcterms:creator: Sungbin Choi
dcterms:description: This dataset is utilized for traffic map prediction using a UNet based deep convolutional neural network, focusing on the prediction of traffic maps.
dcterms:title: Traffic map prediction using UNet based deep convolutional neural network
